articles.description: Manchester United, Chelsea, Arsenal and Liverpool among clubs that have stepped up their season-restart plans by playing friendly matches behind closed doors.
articles.content:
The English Premier League is set to resume on Wednesday June 17, and teams have stepped up their preparations with in-house matches over the weekend.

articles.title: Three failed COVID-19 tests will spark NRL action - ESPN Australia
articles.description: A minimum of three players would need to fail the NRL's pre-match COVID-19 temperature screening tests before officials make a decision on whether to cancel a game, says a top official of the sport.

articles.title: Socceroos keeper Langerak catches coronavirus - The World Game
articles.description: Socceroos goalkeeper Mitch Langerak is facing a stint on the sidelines after testing positive for coronavirus at J.League club Nagoya Grampus.
